titles.title: Authorization bill FY94, Export Administration
Export Administration FY94 Authorization bill
To extend the Export Administration Act of 1979 and to authorize appropriations under that Act for fiscal years 1993 and 1994.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Mr. Gejdenson moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 330 - 54 (Roll no. 31).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 6.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Export Administration Act of 1979 to authorize appropriations for the Department of Commerce under the Act for FY 1993 and 1994. Extends such Act through June 30, 1994.
